p: Cannabinoids are a group of compounds with a characteristic C21 terpenophenolic backbone. This nomenclature can be applied to parent cannabinoids, cannabinoid derivatives, and transformation products. These cannabinoids can be further classified into 11 cannabinoid sub-classes, namely; cannabichromene (CBC), cannabidiol (CBD), cannabielsoin (CBE), cannabigerol (CBG), cannabicyclol (CBL), cannabinol (CBN), cannabinodiol (CBND), cannabitriol (CBT), (−)-Δ 8- trans-tetrahydrocannabinol (Δ8-THC), (−)-Δ 9- trans-tetrahydrocannabinol (Δ 9-THC), and miscellaneous-type cannabinoids.
